title: Benchmark your NoSQL Database
description:
Benchmarking and stress testing are important exercises that both operators and developers do regularly. When it comes to mission critical infrastructure like Apache Cassandra‚Ñ¢, benchmarking your data models should be standard practice, especially before going to production. Many previous benchmarking tools haven't made this process easy. At DataStax we recently open-sourced NoSQLBench, a tool that aims to provide sophisticated and performant benchmarking with Apache Cassandra‚Ñ¢ and other NoSQL tech while not requiring a PHD to do so.

Join our workshop to get an introduction and some hands-on experience with the NoSQL Bench benchmarking tool, and leave ready to execute your own (much simpler) performance benchmarking!

What to expect:
- Understand parameters and key metrics for benchmarking
- How cycles, bindings and statements work together
- Experimenting with stdout
- How to scale up a test and customize your own scenarios
- Packaging a performance test with named scenarios

‚ùìJoin us on DISCORD for questions and FUN
https://discord.gg/U4hFGvC

üì• Materials for today is ;
https://github.com/DataStax-Academy/nosqlbench-workshop-online

https://github.com/DataStax-Academy/microservices-java-workshop-online#3-create-your-astra-instance
